title: 6. Julii; 1644. A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, declaring John Webster, Theophilus Bainham, Edward Manning, Richard Ford and James Yard, merchants, to be incendiaries between the United Provinces, and the kingdom and Parliament of England
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
notes: Order to print dated: Die Sabbathi, 6. Iulii, 1644 and signed: H: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
